entities.name: appGlue
observations: Highly modular architecture with core, DAL, design patterns, IO tools, modularity, and integration submodules.
Implements Factory, Builder, Specification, Observer, and Messaging patterns.
Extensible via ModuleManager and factories, supporting plugin-like growth.
Uses loguru for logging and tqdm for progress visualization in some modules.
Contains several TODOs for refactoring, callback usage, and validation.
Needs improved documentation, naming consistency, and expanded unit tests.
